question:
Arrange the following thermal power stations of India from north to south
1. Bongaigaon Thermal Power Station
2. Talcher Thermal Power Station
3. Mettur Thermal Power Station
4. Kolaghat Thermal Power Station
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Correct order from north to south- Bongaigaon Thermal Power Station (Assam), Kolaghat Thermal Power Station (West Bengal), Talcher Thermal Power Station (Odisha), Mettur Thermal Power Station (Tamil Nadu).
